headline: Halliburton : awarded lithium well project by GeoFrame Energy

headline: Stocks Rally on Hopes of De-Escalation of Hostilities in the Middle East
summary: The S&P 500 Index ($SPX ) (SPY ) Monday closed up +0.96%, the Dow Jones Industrials Index ($DOWI ) (DIA ) closed up +0.89%, and the Nasdaq 100 Index ($IUXX ) (QQQ ) closed up +1.06%. September E-mini S&P futures (ESU25 ) are up +0.96%, and September E-mini Nasdaq futures...

headline: HAL & Petronas to Deploy Next-Gen Tech to Accelerate Exploration
summary: Halliburton teams up with Petronas to deploy next-gen modeling tools to speed up exploration, enhance accuracy and boost reservoir management.
